item.description:
It's time to lock and load with your favorite flavored candy cane. You've heard of food fights, now it's candy fights. It's elf versus elf in a deadly game of delicious sugar. Get ready to stockpile as much candy as you can get your hands on and dig in for a long battle of yummy proportions! Beware of land mine fruit cake and rocket propelled flaming figgy pudding! Gear up your NERF blaster and darts for an epic two hour battle event for ages 6 and up.

Call us at 781-270-4800 to pre-register; $15/member, $20/nonmember. At the door: $20/member, $25/nonmember.
item.name: Buddy Night with NERF: Candy Cane Battle
